casebody.data:
Keith E. ANDERSEN
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 29, 2016 Craig Alan Sullivan, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Lisa Herskowitz, senior assistant state's attorney, and Kathryn W. Bare, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Keith E. Andersen's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 902 , 149 A.3d 502 (2016), is denied.
